element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm smooth the lines in a lines layer, adding extra nodes to it. This is the inverse operation to the one performed by the "simplify lines" algorithms.

element.name: INTERMEDIATE_POINTS
element.text: The nummer of intermediate points to add. A larger value will cause the algorithm to add more points, resulting in a more smooth line, but enlarging the size of the resulting file.

element.name: CURVE_TYPE
element.text: The type of mathematical curve to use for the smoothing

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting layer with smoothed lines.
